attributes.action: intervene and insist that Boots the Chemist Newport Pagnell receives a new style shop sign in keeping with other new, redeveloped stores and the stores new refit.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Please sign this petition to campaign Gordon Brown to get involved and insist that Boots the Chemist Newport Pagnell gets a new and improved shop sign. The council have refused permission for a new sign - despite allowing Woolworths a similar one only a few months ago. A new sign would further improve the area and the regeneration of the high street.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
